author: Jihan Abdalla
title: Louisiana emerging as the next US coronavirus hot spot
description: State officials say they could run out of ventilators and hospital beds by next week as they compete for federal funds.
content:
As the number of confirmed coronavirus infections in the United States surpassed 100,000 on Friday, the state of Louisiana emerged as a new hot spot amid a surge in hospitalisations and looming shortages of supplies, staff and hospital beds.
More than 2,300 … [+5151 chars]
